name: Slither
summary: You are an expert at moving through extremely tight spaces.
description:
You are an expert at moving through extremely tight spaces. You gain the Quick Squeeze skill feat, even if you're not trained in Acrobatics. When you roll a success on an Acrobatics check to Squeeze, you get a critical success instead.Traits

Kobold: A creature with this trait is a member of the kobold ancestry. Kobolds are reptilian humanoids who are usually Small and typically have darkvision. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by kobolds.
